00027 
00028  SUBROUTINE Parameters
00029 
00030 ! Common Variables
00031  USE Domain,    ONLY : inv12, inv6, MaxStep, tDump, tStat, xmax, xmin, ymax, ymin
00032  USE FluidParams
00033 IMPLICIT NONE
00034 
00035 ! Local Variables
00036  INTEGER :: i
00037  INTEGER :: IO_ERR
00038 
00039 ! Read input data from file "properties.in"
00040  OPEN(UNIT = 10, FILE = "properties.in", STATUS = "OLD", ACTION = "READ", &
00041       IOSTAT = IO_ERR)
00042 
00043  IF ( IO_ERR == 0 ) THEN
00044    READ(10,*)
00045    READ(10,*) Maxstep
00046    READ(10,*)
00047    READ(10,*) tStat, tDump
00048    READ(10,*)
00049    READ(10,*) xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax
00050    READ(10,*)
00051    READ(10,*) rhoL, rhoH
00052    READ(10,*)
00053    READ(10,*) tauL, tauH
00054    READ(10,*)
00055    READ(10,*) IntWidth, sigma
00056    READ(10,*)
00057    READ(10,*) pConv
00058    CLOSE(UNIT = 10)
00059  ELSE
00060    STOP "Error: Unable to open input file 'properties.in'"
00061  END IF
00062 
00063 ! Read drop/bubble positions from file "discrete.in"
00064  OPEN(UNIT = 10, FILE = "discrete.in", STATUS = "OLD", ACTION = "READ", &
00065       IOSTAT = IO_ERR)
00066 
00067  IF ( IO_ERR == 0 ) THEN
00068    READ(10,*)
00069    READ(10,*) nBubbles
00070    READ(10,*)
00071    ALLOCATE( bubbles(1:nBubbles,1:3) )
00072    DO i = 1, nBubbles
00073      READ(10,*) bubbles(i,1), bubbles(i,2), bubbles(i,3)
00074    END DO
00075    CLOSE(UNIT = 10)
00076  ELSE
00077    STOP "Error: Unable to open input file 'discrete.in'"
00078  END IF
00079 
00080 ! Constants needed for the free energy terms
00081  beta     = 12.D0*sigma/(IntWidth*( (rhoH - rhoL)**4 ))
00082  kappa    = 1.5D0*sigma*IntWidth/( (rhoH - rhoL)**2 ) 
00083  rhoStar  = 0.5D0*(rhoL + rhoH)
00084  beta4    = 4.D0*beta
00085  kappa_6  = kappa*inv6
00086  kappa_12 = kappa*inv12
00087  kappaEf  = 0.5D0*kappa*inv12
00088  tauRhoStar = (tauH - tauL)/(rhoH - rhoL)
00089 
00090 ! Redefine MaxStep (iterate between 0 and MaxStep-1)
00091  MaxStep = MaxStep - 1
00092 
00093  RETURN
00094  END SUBROUTINE Parameters
